Reviews.Author: lnjbloodwashed
Reviews.Content: I Bought this for my 4 y.o daughter. She also has access to an xbox, nexus 7, ipad and a computer. The tablet is well constructed and she likes playing with the built in camera and video apps.In fact this is what she plays with mostly.My bitter gripe is the price and content of cartridges and apps. I have found that the content is not  engaging when compared to the alternatives available. My daughter will be engaged for hours in repeated play on the Xbox, tablet apps and free internet resources.However she masters the Vtech cartridges and apps rather quickly and as a result seldom engages in repeated play. This certainly does not make the cartridges which retails for over $20 to be attractive to purchase..The price of the non-premium apps ($2.99) is also not competitive with apps available on play google or itunes where you can purchase entertaining and challenging apps for as low as 99 cents.Overall, this is not good value for money especially where a child has alternatives.available.
Reviews.Title: Cartridges and apps do not represent value for money

Reviews.Author: Kezia L Brandt
Reviews.Content: My Daughter didn't really like it. It wasn't high tech enough for her. The touch screen is more of a slam your finger repeatedly into it screen for anything to work. The apps are cute, but just not interesting enough. She get's bored easily with it. And it eats batteries for breakfast lunch and dinner.
Reviews.Title: Battery Gobbler

Reviews.Author: casey merritt
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my daughter for christmas and kept in in a case at all times and its already stopped working when you turn on the camera all that will come up is a green screen. tried new batteries and resetting it, and nothing! Waste of money!!
Reviews.Title: ALREADY STOPPED WORKING!

Reviews.Author: Rozzyrozz40
Reviews.Content: I believe that one should reconsider including a few dollars in the price of this product for the adapter.  I ordered it separately but it doesn't charge the Tablet.  So the children have to sit near an outlet to play the games.  It is a waste of time to invest in the regular batteries for this product as it will last a child the time period of  4 to 5 continuous hours until they (the batteries) exhaust.  Therefore I purchased the V-Tech battery pack which consist of 4 double AA batteries along with it's charger. This was the key to a couple happy campers. So to save your self a headache and money for extra batteries, invest in the battery pack charger to include the 4 batteries needed for this device. Now I will work on adding new games for it.
Reviews.Title: VTech Inno Tab2S WI-FI learning App I like it a lot

Reviews.Author: Armando Chavez
Reviews.Content: Keeps my 2yr old busy for hours without sacraficing our iphones to keep him entertained. Great learning tool too! There is a learning curve but once they get used to it, they can't have enough!
Reviews.Title: Baby's first IPAD

Reviews.Author: ChickieD
Reviews.Content: Bought this for my granddaughter's 3rd birthday. She absolutely loves it!! I highly recommend the VTech InnoTab 2S Wi-Fi Learning App Tablet for toddler's!! ♥
Reviews.Title: Granddaughter LOVES it!!

Reviews.Author: Quenna Corchado
Reviews.Content: I love this tablet!  My kid loves the tablet, sometimes she falls asleep at night when she uses it before bed.  The only thing I think would've made it better would be if it would actually help the kids with their writing.  It has a keyboard, so the kids type information.  I don't know if there's an app for writing, but I haven't found it.
Reviews.Title: It's really great, but...

Reviews.Author: Art of the Oregon Coast
Reviews.Content: These (two I purchased) are a hit with my 3 and 5 year old.. the games are right on track with their age brackets.. pricing was considerably worthy as they are fairly sturdy, friendly, and functional little tablets for the Littles. Glad to have gotten them for them by the deadline of Christmas Day.! :)
Reviews.Title: A hit!

Reviews.Author: DJSalsby
Reviews.Content: We purchased this for our 2 and 3 yr olds. our 2 yr old does not seem as interested in this yet as our 3yr old. We opted for the 2s becuase of the changeable memory available. We go through a lot of batteries, they last on average 3 days. We like that it is big enough to be comfortable but not to big to be bulky. It is durable as it has been droped a few times with no issues. He figured out the rotating camera and has made a few videos of his cars on the hotwheels track. I love that he can operate this with out help from mom or dad.
Reviews.Title: my 3 yr old LOVES this

Reviews.Author: Tanya
Reviews.Content: My daughter loves the games on there they are very educational. The cartridges can get very costly, but she loves to play with her Innotab
Reviews.Title: Inno Tab

Reviews.Author: Beechnut
Reviews.Content: My daughter loves this thing.  Plus it keeps her from always wanting to hop on my ipad and in my opinion is much better for her to be using anyway.
Reviews.Title: super for the kids

Reviews.Author: Lynn Ryerson
Reviews.Content: He couldn't put it down after receiving it...it has kept his interest for over a month now which is a long time for him!
Reviews.Title: A gift for my 4 year old grandson

Reviews.Author: Earnestine P. Easter
Reviews.Content: This is the best grandma purchase ever.  I bought two of these - one for each granddaughter turning two. They really enjoy it and are becoming more and more proficient in using this technology without apprehension. i recommend it highly.
Reviews.Title: Suitable for Two-Year Olds

Reviews.Author: Laura Dias
Reviews.Content: It is really fun and I love it super duper. The games are great. (as told by a five year old boy)
Reviews.Title: Great toy!

Reviews.Author: jehnice
Reviews.Content: I love this so much. My son who is 3 1/2 got this for Christmas, from mommy and daddy and he can't get enought of it. I do have to say you should deff buy the rechargeable battery kit for it because even the best lithium batteries only last a few days.
Reviews.Title: Love love love it

Reviews.Author: Maria Medina
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my 2 year old for Christmas and she don't like it.  The graphics are bad and we can't connect to Wi-Fi at all. Not worth my money on this!
Reviews.Title: Not good!

Reviews.Author: Renee Leach
Reviews.Content: My daughter loves it. She is always trying to take pics on it. I love it. I would recommend this product.
Reviews.Title: tab

Reviews.Author: Vallie Goins
Reviews.Content: My granddaughter was so excited Christmas day when she opened her gift.  She spend hours with her tablet.  A great gift for kids.
Reviews.Title: Love it!

Reviews.Author: Jennifer R. Brown
Reviews.Content: My four year old is really having fun with this Innotab.  He can change out the cartridges and find most apps.  He hasn't started using it for too much more than just the games, but I expect as he's had it longer (only had it 3 weeks at this point), he'll start exploring it more.  I haven't helped much.  I had anticipated taking all of his music CD's, making them into MP3's, and putting them on there but I haven't gotten that far either!My only issues are that I still have not gotten it to connect to my home wi-fi.  I think I may need to do some registration first that I've missed.  It picks up the wifi, tries to connect, but doesn't.  Also, it's kind of depressing to go to Target or somewhere and see a whole wall of accessories and games for the Leap Pad and very little for the Innotab.  I know it's out there, but I guess until more people start using them they will always have less shelf space and I'll have to order online.
Reviews.Title: So far so good!

Reviews.Author: JR
Reviews.Content: Bought this for my 3 year old grandaughter that won't leave my kindle alone.  She plays with it but still wants my kindle.She loves the camera and I found it easy to down load apps.  Nothing free with this that I found.  It went home with my daughter so maybe she did.
Reviews.Title: Good Product

Reviews.Author: C. M. Trump "hope"
Reviews.Content: Bought this instead of the competition because it has wifi. Easy to set up new games. Came with some free downloads. Thought the price was great because it came with a free carry bag. However, found it for less at a local store.
Reviews.Title: Great learning tool

Reviews.Author: Karen Lane "State Buyer"
Reviews.Content: My 3 year old Grandughter is going to go crazy this christmas morning, when she opens this with its matching case!!!
Reviews.Title: New Generation Techno

Reviews.Author: chasinokie
Reviews.Content: Gift it is a Gift really is a Gift aww it is a Gift told u it was a gift
Reviews.Title: gift
